resources.string: This is a ranged weapon that shoots arrows. Most ponies can\'t use a bow while standing next to a hostile character.\n\n
This simple wooden bow might prove to be useful, once you find some arrows.
Arrows launched from this compound bow deal a great amount of damage and have improved accuracy over a wooden bow at the cost of some speed.
Only the greatest archers can use this ruby bow. Almost every arrow pierces through the enemy, leaving a huge hole in his body, but great loyalty is needed to draw the bowstring.
A basic wooden crossbow, looks like it designed to shoot bow arrows.
This reinforced crossbow proves to be a more efficient tool compared to its wooden counterpart.
This deadly weapon is truly a masterpiece of nightwing engineering, one that only the most loyal of ponies can wield effectively.
Pleather quiver suitable to hold any amount of arrows.
This is an arrow. If you have a bow equipped, you can shoot it manually, or auto-shoot the most recent ammo type by tapping an enemy.\n\n
You can\'t shoot while next to an enemy!
It\'s a common wooden arrow with an iron head.
A warm red light radiates from these arrows.
A sheen of deadly poison glistens on these arrows.
These arrows are coated with sticky curare.
These arrows feel strangely cold to the touch.
